channel.title: Brian Maier Jr. | Designer & Developer
channel.description: Louisville Web Design by Brian Maier Jr.

item.title: Draft Post
item.description:
Woah. I've finally finished this portfolio and I couldn't be happier.

I may have jumped the gun but I wanted to get it out and see what people think. There is still plenty of work to be done and by pushing it live I'm hoping to have it done sooner than later.

item.title: Style Guide
item.description:
A constant work in progress that represents markup patterns and common styles from this site.

Body Text

Gastropub before they sold out selvage Echo Park Banksy locavore, pop-up High Life whatever artisan polaroid fanny pack distillery brunch. Meggings craft beer cardigan fanny pack fixie Portland YOLO, mixtape art party.

Mumblecore iPhone distillery Cosby sweater, mlkshk selvage Thundercats brunch deep v try-hard mixtape. Post-ironic asymmetrical kogi four loko. Kitsch Blue Bottle jean shorts fingerstache, gluten-free photo booth banjo.

Blockquote

"This is a blockquote"

Heading One

Heading Two

Heading Three

Heading Four

Heading Five
Heading Six

Unordered List

  • UL List Item
    • Nested List Item
      • Nested List Item
  • UL List Item
  • UL List Item
  • UL List Item

Ordered List

  1. OL List Item
  2. OL List Item
  3. OL List Item
  4. OL List Item
  5. OL List Item

Code Highlighting

<div class="example">
    <h1>Heading</h1> 
    <div class="example-sub">
        <p>Hello World!</p>
    </div>
</div>

item.title: New Year, New Site
item.description:
Woah. I've finally finished this portfolio and I couldn't be happier.

I may have jumped the gun but I wanted to get it out and see what people think. There is still plenty of work to be done and by pushing it live I'm hoping to have it done sooner than later. Thanks to this article I decided to just put up what I have and run with it.

The unofficial to-do list

  • Test, test, and test more on multiple devices.
  • Check for unused css/code
  • Image optimization for mobile
  • Mess with fittext on homepage (still too small)
  • Customize sharing buttons
  • Add Disqus to posts
  • Set up Vertical Rhythm

If you notice anything else that is off or wonky please feel free to comment. Thanks for reading.
